name: Dimensional Flow
desc: When the flagship is phasing, the degree of time acceleration is increased by +{%s}

name: Anomalous Anchor
desc: Each normally operating phased ship in the fleet has a {%s} chance per day of causing a phasing disruption that reduces the {CR} of the remaining non-phased ships. The larger the phase ship, the more frequently it happens and with more severe outcomes, with a {CR} reduction of roughly {%s} of the ratio of deployment points in total.
extra1: The temporal anomaly ripples through your fleet, reducing it by a total of {%s} CR.

name: Letter Opener
desc: Our ship will take extra damage if it is hit at an angle from the ship's main longitudinal axis by more than {%s} degrees; the greater the deviation the greater the damage sustained, reaching a maximum of {%s} when backstabbed
